body.name: Mounting Dream TV Wall Mounts TV Bracket for Most 42-84 Inch TVs, UL Listed Premium TV Mount Full Motion with Articulating Arms, Max VESA 600x400mm and 100LBS, Fits 16", 18", 24" Studs, MD2296-24K

features: Universal Compatibility - Full motion TV wall mount for most 42-84 inch OLED/LED/Plasma/Curved TVs up to 100LBS, fits Max VESA 600X400mm (24"x16"), wall mounting wood studs spacing is 16", 18", and 24".
Heavy Duty Design - Strong materials while maintain smooth moves make the whole TV bracket unit safe and durable . Upgrade viewing experience with 5°/-15° tilt , 45° swivel and 4° level adjustment .

Easy For TV Centering - This TV mount fits for solid concrete wall / wood stud spacing of 16", 18", 24". Easy centering (lateral adjustment) with 24” long wall plate. Caution: This TV mounting bracket is NOT for drywall alone.

Easy To Install - Wall mount tv bracket comes with decent instruction , necessary hardware in pre-labeled bags , bubble level and cable ties for neat cable management . Concrete Anchors could be obtained by Mounting Dream customer service ( Anchor Size: φ10x50mm ).
World-Class Customer Service - Our US based customer service experts are available Every day of the week to help . Our TV mount is 10-year warranted !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mount was easy to install with clear instructions. The mount came with extenders which gave me flexibility to mount it where I wanted on the wall and be able to find studs. I didn't mount it exactly level but was able to adjust the TV after it was mounted with the adjusting plate that were easy to adjust. It fits snuggly against the wall and also pulls out far and rotates so we can watch it from the other room. Great product. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for 65" TCL.
reviews.reviewText: Mounted 65" 6 Series TCL. Came out perfect. Mount is excellent, very strong, easy to adjust. Instructions are great. Definitely consider if the vesa screw holes are in the middle of your TV or towards the bottom and factor that in when determining how high off the ground the mount should go, otherwise your TV may wind up too high. I took an extra few minutes to measure it all out (my VESA screw holes were towards bottom of TV) and I subtracted a few extra inches or so from the height I wanted the center of my TV and it came out right where I wanted it because this 6 series TCL hangs higher than a TV with vertically centered vesa screw holes. Nominal height is suggested 42" for center of TV. I put my center of TV around 48" off the ground.You can definitely hang with one person because after you get the mount up, you basically hook the TV onto the mount and then clamp it in. However, when you hook the TV onto the mount, the TV will tip forward under its own weight unless you first turn the arms/levers on the mount to tighten the mount into a vertical position before you put the TV on it. If you do that first then hook the TV onto the lateral bar you could let go (at your own discretion) and screw the clamps into place to lock the TV onto the mount. You need to use a screwdriver to tighten the clamp and lock the TV onto the mount.ONE DRAWBACK FOR BIGGER TVS: If you need to angle TV significantly you may want to opt for mount with longer arm. The bigger the TV the less you will be able to angle without it bumping into wall. In the pic this was the maximum I was able to angle my TV. I do wish I could squeeze a few more degrees out of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a full motion mount - Buy It! Mount looks great in my son's room. The installer said that it was easy to install and a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got it on sale for a great price. It was easy to install and it is very sturdy!Would definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy with nice motion, with only one complaint.
reviews.reviewText: The good:Once you get this installed, it's very nice. I used this one on a 65" Roku TV and I'm 100% confident that it's not going to fall off the wall. The motion is very smooth for swiveling and pulling away from the wall. You can't swivel a 65" TV too far without the need to pull it away from the wall a little, and this mount handles this motion flawlessly. This was important to us since we swivel it often when going back and forth from our kitchen and family room. Tilting is very easy to set but note that once you set it, the only way to change it is to loosen a couple of screws. I think setting the tilt motion once and forgetting it is actually a good thing because otherwise it would probably start drifting over time.The Bad:The only reason I took one star off is because of the safety lock design. While it is sturdy, it is a little bit of a pain while installing. The latch keeps flipping down while the TV tilts forward. You almost need a 3rd person to feel safe while doing this. Two to hold the TV while the 3rd person uses both hands to hold the latch up and insert a screw.This is the 6th Mounting Dream bracket I have purchased over the years and all the other ones have a simple (and sturdy) safety lock system which uses two long set screws which are already in place and only need to be turned a bit to prevent the TV from tilting forward. Much easier to install and just as sturdy. I only went with this model because I wanted a 600mmx400mm max VESA pattern to future proof it a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A wonderfully built piece!
reviews.reviewText: This mounting system is probably heavier duty than I needed, but that's NOT a criticism at all. Solidly built, with clear instructions. A nice coating (perhaps powder coating?) so no risk of deterioration/rust. My particular system allows for full turning side to side and pulling out quite substantially. The only aspect that requires a little more tweaking on my part is the vertical angle, and Mounting Dream includes a small wrench to do so if needed (though once you set your vertical angle, I'm not sure it's necessary to change it). I've never needed to change it.One aspect to consider: installation may be daunting for some. You MUST find your studs with a decent finder and plan your install carefully (which a person should do anyway: remember the old adage: measure twice, cut/drill once). Mounting Dream also includes instructions for effective visual placement.Excellent piece: I would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As perfect as a TV mount can be
reviews.reviewText: This is a great, solid TV wall mount. I love the wide range of motions. It really is full motion. You definitely need 2 people to put it together and it did take us a long time; but we are novices! Lol If we can do it, you can too! Lol It fits our 50" t.v perfectly with the extenders that are included. The different size screws (and the extenders) are so that it will work with a wide range of televisions. It's really solid when screwed in to studs (like it needs to be). A really great buy. I am def satisfied with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mount is better than last model.
reviews.reviewText: This mount is better than last model. It's solid built and works as it should. No issues.
El soporte está genial y muy útil si quieres ver la pantalla desde diferentes lugares de una habitación grande

Easy to install. Love that you can use the extension brackets to help centre your Tv even when your studs don’t always align. We’ve purchased two of these and both worked perfectly, are sturdy and were easy to understand instructions. Best mount we’ve purchased yet. Highly recommended!
